name: aframe-video-billboard
description: Video Billboard entity & component for A-Frame.

scripts.build-example: browserify examples/main.js --verbose -t babelify -t uglifyify -t [envify --NODE_ENV development ] > examples/build.js
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js --verbose --debug --standalone registerAframeVideoBillboard -g uglifyify -t [ rollupify --config rollup.config.js ] -t babelify -t [envify --NODE_ENV production ] | exorcist dist/out.map > dist/out.js && uglifyjs dist/out.js --screw-ie8 -c -m --in-source-map dist/out.map --source-map dist/aframe-video-billboard.min.js.map --source-map-url aframe-video-billboard.min.js.map > dist/aframe-video-billboard.min.js && rm dist/out*
scripts.start: budo examples/main.js:../build.js --ssl --serve build.js --dir examples --port 8000 --live --open -- --debug --verbose -t babelify -t [envify --NODE_ENV development ]
scripts.prepublish: in-publish && npm run dist && npm run build-lib || not-in-publish
scripts.preghpages: npm run build-example && rm -rf gh-pages && mkdir gh-pages && cp -r examples/* gh-pages

author: Jess Telford <hi@jes.st>
